title: Referral
rulesOverview: Overview: Account levels range from S5 up to S0 (six levels in total), with S0 being the highest. Each level offers two-tier referral rewards, and the rebate rate varies by level. Rebates are calculated based on your own level. Example: If an S0 account invites A, the S0 account can earn up to 56% of A's trading fees on every trade. If A then invites B, the S0 account can additionally earn 14% of B's trading fees. Therefore, for an S0 account the Tier-1 cap is 56%, the Tier-2 cap is 14%, and the combined cap is 70%. If only A exists (no B), then only Tier-1 rebates apply.
tradeAmount: Trade Amount: Notional value of a single matched trade (denominated in USDC).
platform: Platform: The service provider that collects the fee.
publicPool: Public Pool: Ecosystem treasury; funded by "Pool Baseline + Market Surplus."
market: Market: Allocation available for agent/broker rebate distribution.
l2Upline: L2 (Upline): The referrer of your L1.
level: Level: S5 (entry) → S0 (highest); determines the account's total rebate cap.
tradingFee: Trading Fee: 2% (After the handling fee is allocated to the Maker, it will be included in the commission distribution mechanism for this round.)
allocation: Allocation: Platform 20% | Market 70% | Public Pool Baseline 10%
noteFixed: * Note: Fixed inflow to the Public Pool = Baseline 10% + any undistributed remainder from the Market allocation.
feeRebateCaps: III. Fee Rebate Caps by Level
socTokenRebate: IV. SOC Token Rebate Caps by Level
exampleSOC: (Example: 10,000 USDC volume → 1,000 SOC minted; user keeps 800 SOC as base reward; 200 SOC to allocate)
volumeReset: Trading volume and tier will be reset and recalculated each calendar month.
